title: ✅ Chrome Browser Required
description: AutoTester currently supports Chrome only. Make sure you have Chrome browser installed and ready to use.

title: ✅ Your Web App URL
description: Have the application you want to test ready and accessible. You'll need the URL of your web application to start recording.

title: ✅ 15 Minutes
description: That's all you need to create your first test. Set aside 15 minutes to complete the entire setup and recording process.
